itunes:title: The Fruit of the Spirit Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
title: The Fruit of the Spirit Week 1 with Jessica Lamb
description:
For the first week of The Fruit of the Spirit series, Raechel and Amanda talk with She Reads Truth Editorial Director, Jessica Lamb. Together, they talk about how the simplest aspects of everyday life, from FIFA and fiddle-leaf figs to sunflowers and successful parenting, strengthen our understanding of the fruit of the Spirit. Join us this week as we correct our misconceptions about the fruit of the Spirit and find encouragement in what it means to produce fruit and become more like Christ.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth The Fruit of the Spirit reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop The Fruit of the Spirit Reading Plan collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/the-fruit-of-the-spirit-week-1/
